topics.body: You know what? I just came to a realization. Kingdom Hearts could possibly be crossed over with just about _any_ franchise. Super hero comics, mecha anime, tokusatsu, rap music, any kind of music, shounen, sienen, kaiju, satire, you name it, it can happen.
